tool_description: Traces the etymological roots of words back through historical language families, identifying proto-forms and ancestral connections.

source_language.description: ISO 639-1 code of the word's current language

depth_levels.description: Number of ancestral levels to trace back (1-10)

error_messages: Invalid language code: Provide a valid ISO 639-1 language code.
Word not found: The specified word cannot be found in etymological databases.
Depth level out of range: Set depth_levels between 1 and 10.
Incomplete etymology: Some ancestral forms could not be determined due to insufficient historical data.
usage: Provide the word and source_language, optionally set depth_levels to control how far back the etymology traces.

etymology_chain.description: Sequential array of ancestral word forms from newest to oldest

language_families.description: Language family names corresponding to each level in the etymology chain

estimated_dates.description: Estimated date ranges for each ancestral form

confidence_scores.description: Confidence scores (0-1) for each etymological connection
